sortBy.displayName: _value {_field="value", _start="2023-04-25 23:03:21.013 +0000 UTC", _stop="2023-04-26 00:03:21.013 +0000 UTC", cluster_name="groot.eng.qumulo.com", max_drive_failures="2", max_node_failures="1", name="groot", platform="hardware", service_model="self_hosted", uuid="af6d3031-a169-4f5c-a569-aa65b90327ef", version="Qumulo Core 6.0.2"}

targets.query:
measurement = "qumulo_info"
fields = ["cluster_name", "version"]
from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == measurement)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: fields)
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: fields)
  |> rename(columns: {cluster_name: "Cluster Name", version: "Version"})

from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_quorum_node_is_offline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["node_id"] == "${Node}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

measurement = "qumulo_node_info"
fields = ["node_model"]
from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == measurement)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: fields)
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: fields)
  |> rename(columns: {node_model: "Node Model"})

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")

from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_disk_endurance_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["node_id"] == "${Node}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

Cluster = "${Cluster}"
Node = "${Node}"

lsum = from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_disk_operation_latency_seconds_sum")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == Cluster)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["node_id"] == Node)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

lcount = from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_disk_operation_latency_seconds_count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster_name"] == Cluster)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["node_id"] == Node)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

// Joining and mapping the data
join(
    tables: {lsum: lsum, lcount: lcount},
    on: ["_time", "cluster_name", "node_id", "drive_bay", "disk_type", "io_type"]
)
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: r._value_lsum / r._value_lcount, cluster_name: r.cluster_name, node_id: r.node_id, drive_bay: r.drive_bay, disk_type: r.disk_type, io_type: r.io_type }))

from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["node_id"] == "${Node}")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "Qumulo Alerts Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qumulo_node_info")
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["cluster_name"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["cluster_name"])
  |> distinct(column: "cluster_name")
